lines.text: Look at this, a big yellow butterfly. It's unusual to see one of those at this time of year, unless of course, it flew up from Brazil. I'll bet that's it. They DO that sometimes, you know. They fly up from Brazil, and they...

[interrupting]
This is no butterfly, this is a potato chip.
Well, I'll be, so it is. I wonder how a potato chip got all the way up here from Brazil?
Boy, I like summer camp. It's the next-best thing to being in the infantry.
Do you know why English teachers go to college for four years?
No.
Well then, I'll tell you why English teachers go to college for four years.
[Yelling]
So they can learn how to make stupid little kids write stupid essays about what they did all stupid summer!

[after swatting a bee with his blanket that was previously after Violet]
Not unlike Robin Hood.
Hey, there's a spider on that log!
WAAH!
[falls down with the logs]
I'm sorry I was wrong, it was just a piece of bark.
Hey, I was right, there really is a spider on that log!
WAAH!
[falls again with the logs]
I'm sorry I was wrong again, it was just an old cocklebur.

[on their way to school]
Did you wash your hands? Let's see your fingernails.
[looks at Linus's hand]
They're clean! How'd you get your fingernails so clean?
Toothpaste.

[writing his essay]
The worst was yet to come. It was bad enough at having been so thoroughly thrashed in softball. But there were plans for a nature hike the next day. The campfire activity - was a dismal failure.
It was a short summer, Charlie Brown.
And it looks like it's gonna be a looong winter.

[yelling]
Hey, there's a bug in your hair, Charlie Brown!

[frantic]
Where? Where? Brush it off!
That's alright, it's gone now.
That's the one thing I hate about all this outdoor living!
Well, don't worry, it's not in your hair anymore. It fell down your neck.
[repeated line]
All right, everybody, move it along. Hup-hup-hup.

[after Snoopy leaves the table, gagging on spaghetti]
Where on earth is Snoopy going? He's gotta eat; who's gonna feed him?
[Lucy gets kissed by Snoopy during the arm wrestling match]

[goes hysterical]
Ugh! Foul! Foul! This stupid Masked Marvel fouled! And I'm the rightful winner! I won!
Shermy, you've got to come up with something that we can win at. Isn't there a champion that will come forth and uphold the right?

[writing his essay]
The worst was yet to come. It was bad enough at having been so thoroughly thrashed in softball. But there were plans for a nature hike the next day. The campfire activity was a dismal failure.
Eagle claws! OK Chuck, we'll take our outs to bat.
Eagle claws?
You guys shag 'em for us.
Eagle claws?
